Line15.A109C: When that's done, we'll have a way to find the wight.
Line17.A109C: Remember, the spirits don't want us here, and every time you light a shrine, they'll get angrier.
Line19.A109C: Try not to die. I don't want to do this alone.
Line3.A109C: This altar is empty. You must take the hair and light it at each shrine.
